text: The 1952 Volta a Catalunya was the 32nd edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 7 September to 14 September 1952. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Miguel Poblet. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 44" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 33" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 05" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 22" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 11" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 11" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 39" |} |} ==References== 1952 Volta Category:1952 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1952 sports events
